channel.title: Verses on Musings of an IT Fossil
channel.description: Recent content in Verses on Musings of an IT Fossil

item.title: Cant Ever Go Back
item.description: I had pep in my step But then I realized Getting back to the past Is a big ole pack of lies We cant ever go back There is no path No matter our desire It dont balance with math Reality is tough Shit is going off the rails River of shit oncoming Gonna need a lot of pails Fascists on the march Sieg Heil like a motherfucker If you believe this ends well Youre just a useful sucker

item.title: JIRA Board Ballads
item.description: 99 Epics on the Board Link to heading 99 Epics on the Board 99 Epics on the Board We take one down, code all around 134 Epics on the Board 134 Epics on the Board 134 Epics on the Board We groom one out, disagree aloud 2673 Epics on the Board I’m a Bug Ticket Link to heading Iâ€™m a bug ticket Easy and quick Here is my repro (one eye on git) Here is my AC (other eye on my slack)

item.title: Lady Mary
item.description: She comes in so many forms But in each her effect is so divine No matter the delivery She distills the pain into wine Human quest for fleeting joy Seems a cruel joke in a cold universe Being alive with questions Is a wonder that evolves into a curse In those times that I desire To turn off the crisis and forget In an effort to escape All of the learned pain and regret

item.title: Process Parley
item.description: There is trouble in the world I wanna solve it Sadly there is a process to follow Goddamn we gotta evolve it I got a fix for the problem Waiting on a sucker to hit a button They will gorge themselves on my pain Like an addicted glutton Nothing ever changes Each day brings more of the same Slowly devouring every urge I got to keep playing the game Every solution we devise Births a dozen more epic fails Every engineer in the mix Can tell many sordid sad tales

item.title: WordPress Wankery
item.description: Mullenweg be tripping Punch drunk and trifling across the web Preaching that he needs our fealty Because he is lord and we are mere plebs WordPress is straight shit But it managed to set the world on fire Constant updates to its insecure code Is the only thing we really requires Even though he is rich He greedy like a strung out crack whore Even though he has it all He sending bill collectors to WPEs door
